name: Pyramid Madness (Scinacz)
description:
Did you ever wanted to play  a game where graphics are shit and everytime you die your save gets deleted? Well do i got a game for you!

This game is rage inducing, has terrible graphics, and for now it has only 3 levels and a level editor so you can create your own suffering.

(there is no going to the main menu unless you beat the 3 levels, also there is another way of getting the Level Editor than buying it in the shop)

LEVEL EDITOR CONTROLS:

-middle click + drag (moving around the camera)

-left click (selecting)

-right click (deselecting)

GLITCHES:

-Sometimes there is a black screen after clicking play then just alt+f4 and restart the game
